bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names Yu qi ding chuang 魚臍丁瘡 , fish belly pin-sores. Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions resembling the long and narrow shape of a fish belly. They have a white or slightly dark spot in their center, and are red onall four sides. Also, the swelling is painful and liquid seeps from it. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 治魚 臍瘡，頭白腫痛不可忍者方 , “Recipe to cure fish belly sores with a white top, swelling and unbearable pain”.
